tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_images (
  image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name VARCHAR(100),
  image_type VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_demographics(patient_id),
  date_uploaded TIMESTAMP,
  image_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE patient_demographics (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  study_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  study_date DATE,
  imaging_results TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_demographics(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    race VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Medical_Records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    record_date DATE,
    physician_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Imaging_Reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id UUID REFERENCES Medical_Records(record_id),
    imaging_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    findings VARCHAR(500)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients(
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords(
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  physician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE ImagingStudies(
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  study_type VARCHAR(50),
  study_date DATE,
  results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments(
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  physician_id INT,
  status ENUM('Scheduled', 'Cancelled', 'Completed')
);
